name: HOW TO DO PARIS CHEAP - Country #9 of 12
description: September saw my 9th trip of 2015 to Paris, France. Staying at the highly rated Hotel De La Porte Doree for 2 nights, perfectly located to explore the Eiffel Tower, the Louvre and the Arc De Triomphe amongst others. Also catch my review of the Air France business and first class lounge as well as the SkyTeam business lounge at London Heathrow
